#summary REST API: Early Payment

= Introduction =

REST calls to get early payment data.


= Details =

*Get EP available Count:* http://72.167.4.179/taulia_android_app/index.php?qry=ep_count

Response:
{{{
<response>
	<method>ep_count</method>
	<ep_count>2</ep_count>
</response>
}}}
